username.title: Login
username.description: The email address used to log in to GoodData. Must have admin privileges.

customDomain.title: Custom domain
customDomain.description:
If project is white-labeled, specify the custom domain in format https://domain.gooddata.com.
Defaults for regions:
  • US, AP - https://secure.gooddata.com/,
  • EU - https://keboola.eu.gooddata.com/.
